text: Alessandra Sardoni (born 5 May 1964 in Rome) is an Italian journalist and television presenter. From 2013 to 2014, she was president of the Parliamentary Press Association. In June 2015, she was awarded the Premiolino. ==Life== She studied with Tullio De Mauro. She worked for La Repubblica. She hosted the Otto e mezzo program and the Omnibus morning program. ==References== category:living people Category:1964 births Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian television presenters Category:People from Rome
title: Alessandra Sardoni
